original_title: Focus on Clinical Research, Episode 1: The Johns Hopkins Story
overview: How did psychedelics, not so long ago cast into the wilderness by the medical community, so quickly return to one of Americaâ€™s most prestigious research institutions and graduate to the pages of the field's premier journals?  Join us as we learn the stories of the scientists at Johns Hopkins Center for Psychedelic & Consciousness Research who re-opened the doors, and the new generation of researchers working to explore the potential of psychedelics in science and medicine.
title: Focus on Clinical Research, Episode 1: The Johns Hopkins Story
